org.fridlund.pacman.entities

Class SpecialSnack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.EntityAbstract
      • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.MovableEntityAbstract
        • org.fridlund.pacman.entities.Snack
          • org.fridlund.pacman.entities.SpecialSnack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.Entity, org.fridlund.javalabra.game.entities.MovableEntityInterface

    public class SpecialSnack
extends Snack
    A place holder for the special action command. When the SpecialSnack's execute command is called, it'll execute the interfaces execute method.
